metadata.description: Planning family outings and activities for second-class

transcript.speaker: xiao_mei
transcript.content: 你好! 我是小美。让我们学习如何规划家庭出游。

transcript.speaker: xiao_mei
transcript.content: Say: 'There's a school fair on Saturday'

transcript.speaker: child
transcript.content: There's a school fair on Saturday

transcript.speaker: xiao_mei
transcript.content: 太棒了! Sharing events helps family stay connected!

transcript.speaker: xiao_mei
transcript.content: You can also say: 'Can we visit the park this weekend?'

transcript.speaker: child
transcript.content: Can we visit the park this weekend?

transcript.speaker: xiao_mei
transcript.content: 好棒! Family adventures create wonderful memories!
